before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"dvku5","text":"Make sure all your lab devices and supplies are sterilized","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1k0o3","text":"We present the TRIzol protocol for RNA extraction. We employed leaf tissue from vegetative and reproductive plants from four solanaceous species of the genus Datura; D. stramonium, D. pruinosa, D. inoxia and D. wrightii.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":158,"length":62}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"d207p","text":"Set flash-frozen tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21rvl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3bpsd","text":"Prepare reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jdak","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7k2d","text":"Isolate and store RNA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23km5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"titj","text":"Quantify and verify RNA quality and integrity","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

journals.name: Ecology and Evolution
journals.citation: Kariñho Betancourt E, Calderón Cortés N, Tapia López R, De‐la‐Cruz I, Núñez Farfán J, Oyama K (2024) Comparative transcriptome profiling reveals distinct regulatory responses of secondary defensive metabolism in Datura species (Solanaceae) under plant development and herbivory‐mediated stress. Ecology and Evolution 14(7). doi: 10.1002/ece3.11496

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"dp2ua","text":"Biological material: Leaf tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jrn6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9rudu","text":"Reagents: Chloroform:Isoamyl, saline solution, 75% ethanol, isopropyl alcohol, TRIzol reagent, DNAsa I, RNase free water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":18}],"data":{}},{"key":"803oi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6t1qq","text":"Laboratory devices: Centrifuge, tissuelyser, vortex mixer, thermo-shaker for microtubes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36e9j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6gbah","text":"Other lab supplies: mortar and pestle, 1.5 ml Eppendorf tube, steel beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"alif9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"A05302BB119511EC86EF0A58A9FEAC02","url":null}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1potg","text":"Reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8u6i1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5pp0","text":"Chloroform:Isoamyl alcohol (24:1) 100ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":38}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55a6c","text":"    96 ml Chloroform","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6p5lk","text":"    4 ml Isoamyl alcohol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56td8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"37s14","text":"Saline solution 500 ml ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ttto","text":"    0.8M Sodium Citrate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fdctv","text":"    1.2 M NaCl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f50vs","text":"    Distilled water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qspl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94jpd","text":"75% ethanol 100 ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"afu5h","text":"    75 ml of ethanol molecular biology grade (100%)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vmno","text":"    25 ml of Distilled water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d94jf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9nj8k","text":"Isopropyl alcohol (Isopropanol) molecular biology grade","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":55}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":18}],"data":{}},{"key":"dqots","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dq63s","text":"TRIzol reagent (Invitrogen/Thermofisher)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":40}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ir1b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"esvtt","text":"DNAsa I","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2rk5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8svih","text":"RNase free water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bauhb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"3438B609118F11EC86EF0A58A9FEAC02","url":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8h558","text":"Protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"asq9n","text":"Grind tissue to a powder in liquid nitrogen with cold (-80°C 1 hr sterilized) mortar and pestle","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6b4f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"qnes","text":"In a 1.5 ml Eppendorf tube add 50-100 mg of ground tissue plus 1ml of TRIzol Reagent and 5 μl of DNAsa I. Mix by vortex 30 seconds. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4192j","text":"Add two sterilized steel beads and high-speed shake the tube in a Tissuelyser II (QIAGEN), at 30 Hz for 45 seconds. Repeat 2 more times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2jpdo","text":"Take out the beads and incubate the mixture at room temperature in the same Eppendorf tube for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"rq31","text":"Centrifuge the tube at 13,000 rpm for 15 min at 4°C. All of the insoluble matter should form a pellet at the bottom of the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bg3tg","text":"Transfer the aqueous phase (upper) in a new 1.5 ml tube and add 250 μl of isoamyl alcohol. Mix by inversion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4liau","text":"Centrifuge the tube at 13,000 rpm for 15 min at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12pe2","text":"Transfer the upper aqueous phase in a new 1.5 ml tube and add 250 μl of Saline solution and then 250 μl of isopropanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bbvhu","text":"Mix by inversion and incubate on ice for 10 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b414b","text":"Centrifuge at 13,000 rpm for 10 min at 4°C, and decant the supernatant, taking care not to lose the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":31}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"701C4652119011EC86EF0A58A9FEAC02","url":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"15r0m","text":"Add 1 ml 75% cooled ethanol to the pellet and centrifuge at 13,000 rpm for 10 min at 4°C and decant the supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bp1fc","text":"Add 30μl RNase-free water and heat at 55°C to resuspend the pellet carefully.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"jg63","text":"Analyze (quantify concentration, quality, and integrity of the RNA) and store the tube at -80°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fj6kl","text":"The integrity of each sample of RNA was first visualized by electrophoresis in 1.0% agarose stained with Ethidium Bromide (EtBr). The gel was run in TBE 0.5X buffer prepared in water treated with DEPC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9732d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1o16g","text":"Then the quantity and quality of RNA samples were verified by UV absorbance in Nanodrop (Thermo Scientific) and by fluorescence measurements with Qubit 3.0 (Invitrogen) using 2ul of each sample of RNA .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: RNA TRIzol isolation of Datura spp.

versions.title: RNA TRIzol isolation of Datura spp.
